Key Match Events: Wales held 10-man Turkey to a 0-0 draw
Baris Alper Yilmaz was sent off for Turkey on 62 minutes
Kevin De Bruyne scored a brace for Belgium in a 3-1 victory over Israel
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy took charge of Wales for the first time
Wales' match against Turkey was their first under Bellamy's leadership
Post-Match Reflections: Wales showed positive signs under Bellamy's leadership
Belgium's performance showed their undoubted quality
Others: The match was played at the Cardiff City Stadium
The match was part of the UEFA Nations League
